com.webcheckers.application

Class PlayerLobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webcheckers.application.PlayerLobby

  • public class PlayerLobby
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayerLobby

    Represents the lobby in which all players inhabit and from which they log in and out of.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerLobby()
      Constructs a new PlayerLobby to store signed-in players.

      Generates a list of all the names of players who are signed-in.
      Player signin(java.lang.String name)
      Given that a user name isAvailable, store player name in the player hash map -- thus player is signed-in.

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        name - the player's username
        Returns:
        true if the player exists and was successfully removed
